body: Builds are fixed now. Got lucky with the TaskCluster build, and fixed the CircleCI build with a workaround in the linting Dockerfile (see the commit message and comment in the diff for more info).
body_text: Builds are fixed now. Got lucky with the TaskCluster build, and fixed the CircleCI build with a workaround in the linting Dockerfile (see the commit message and comment in the diff for more info).
